spatial_accuracy.notes: Major plan mismatch. The 2D plan is essentially a single open Kitchen/Dining/Living zone with one small central bathroom and a large stair block at bottom-left plus a single entrance at bottom-center. The 3D render shows a multi-room layout (bedroom(s), multiple enclosed rooms and corridors) that does not correspond to the 2D room arrangement. Wall lines and room locations do not align; door and window positions do not match the plan; overall proportions and the open-plan relationship are not preserved.

structural_fidelity.notes: Structural relationships are incorrect. The stair core visible in the 2D plan is missing/not represented as a stair block in the 3D render. The single small bathroom in the center of the 2D plan is not faithfully reproduced (3D appears to contain multiple wet rooms/partitions). Adjacency is wrong (2D has large open Living/Dining to the right; 3D subdivides into separate rooms). Multiple hallucinated rooms appear and the primary open space is effectively missing.

furniture_mapping.notes: 2D plan indicates kitchen fixtures and otherwise minimal furniture guidance; 3D includes a bed, desks/tables and other furnishings not supported by the 2D plan layout. Furniture scale is not verifiable against the 2D dimensions due to the fundamental room-layout mismatch.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric viewpoint is generally correct and the model reads as an isometric cutaway. However, the render is soft/blurry with low material definition; some geometry/edges appear muddy, reducing clarity. Lighting is acceptable but flat; composition is clean enough for viewing.

detected_errors.description: Missing stair block: the large bottom-left stair element from the 2D plan is not present in the 3D render.
Missing open-plan Kitchen/Dining/Living configuration: 2D shows a largely open right-side Living/Dining and top-left Kitchen; 3D subdivides into multiple rooms.
Bathroom placement/layout incorrect: 2D has one small central bathroom core; 3D shows different bathroom(s) and partitioning not matching the central compact block.
Entrance location incorrect: 2D entrance is centered on the bottom wall; 3D does not clearly show a matching bottom-center entry aligned to the plan.
Window placement mismatch: 2D indicates specific window groupings on right and bottom walls; 3D window count/positions do not correspond to those locations.

Door orientation/placement mismatch: 2D shows specific door swings (kitchen top opening, bathroom doors, and main entrance); 3D door openings are in different walls/rooms and do not match swing locations.
Room proportion distortion: the 2D living room is a long 13' x 24' zone on the right; 3D replaces it with smaller rooms, destroying the intended proportions.
Hallucinated bedroom and additional rooms: 3D includes at least one bedroom and extra enclosed spaces/corridors not present in the 2D plan.
Hallucinated furniture set (bed/office furniture) not supported by the 2D plan’s room program.
Rendering softness/blur reduces edge clarity, making wall/door details difficult to verify precisely.
